Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV7Ma.name: Mapping
Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV7Ma.abstract: The signature of the closure that will do the mapping.

Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV13j.name: jsonDecodable(using:)
Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV13j.abstract: Decodes the data into a Decodable instance which is then passed to a closure to source the settng key value pairs from.

Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV4js.name: json(using:)
Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV4js.abstract: Deserializes the JSON in the data into a known Foundation type. Usually a [String: Any] or [Any] and passes it to the closure to source the settng key value pairs from.

Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV14j.name: jsonDictionary(using:)
Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV14j.abstract: Convenience variation on json(using:) that assumes the data contains a valid JSON dictionary.

Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV5pl.name: plist(using:)
Structs/Mapper.html#/s:5Locus6MapperV5pl.abstract: Reads the data as plist file contents using a PropertyListSerialization instance.

Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.name: Completion
Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.abstract: A closure that will accept the source’s results.

Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.name: DataReader
Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.abstract: The closure that will read the data.

Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.name: dataSource(_:)
Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.abstract: Provides an already established Data instance as the source of settings.

Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.name: url(_:session:)
Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.abstract: Creates a DataSource that reads data from a URL.

Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.name: request(_:session:)
Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.abstract: Creates a DataSource that reads data from a URLRequest.

Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.name: file(_:)
Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.abstract: Creates a DataSource that reads the contents of a local file.

Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.name: file(_:inBundle:)
Structs/DataSource.html#/s:5Locus10DataS.abstract: Creates a DataSource that reads the contents of a file stored in a bundle.

Structs/DataSource.html.name: DataSource
Structs/DataSource.html.abstract: DataSources are using by the Loader class to read data containing settings and defaults.

Structs/Loader.html.name: Loader
Structs/Loader.html.abstract: Loads settings from a source and passes it to a mapper before updating Locus with new defaults.

Structs/Mapper.html.name: Mapper
Structs/Mapper.html.abstract: Mappers are responsible for taking the raw Data that a DataSource generates, reading it and returning a Dictionary of settings.

Structs/UserDefaultsStoreFactory.html.name: UserDefaultsStoreFactory
Structs/UserDefaultsStoreFactory.html.abstract: Creates stores for values that can read and write to the app’s user defaults.

Protocols/StoreFactory.html#/s:5Locus12S.name: createStoreForSetting(withKey:access:parent:)
Protocols/StoreFactory.html#/s:5Locus12S.abstract: called to create a store for a setting with the passed details.

Protocols/Loadable.html#/s:5Locus8Loadab.name: update(key:withNewDefault:)
Protocols/Loadable.html#/s:5Locus8Loadab.abstract: Updates the Loadable with a new value for a key.

Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.name: register(_:)
Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.abstract: Registers settings with the container using one or more closures containing the register calls.

Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.name: resolve(_:)
Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.abstract: Resolves a setting and returns the current value for it.

Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.name: resolve(_:)
Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.abstract: Resolves a setting and returns the current value for it.

Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.name: store(key:value:)
Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.abstract: Update the current value of the setting. Note that the settings must have a access level of .writable, .transient or .releaseLocked (if this is a Debug build) for this to work.

Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.name: store(key:value:)
Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.abstract: Update the current value of the setting. Note that the settings must have a access level of .writable, .transient or .releaseLocked (if this is a Debug build) for this to work.

Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.name: subscript(_:)
Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.abstract: Sets or returns the value for a setting.

Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.name: subscript(_:)
Protocols/SettingsContainer.html#/s:5Loc.abstract: Sets or returns the value for a setting.

Protocols/Container.html#/s:5Locus9Conta.name: registerAppPreferences
Protocols/Container.html#/s:5Locus9Conta.abstract: True by default. Auto-registers preferences found in the app’s Root.plist and any child panes with the user defaults system.

Protocols/Container.html#/s:5Locus9Conta.name: appSettingsBundle
Protocols/Container.html#/s:5Locus9Conta.abstract: Override which allows settings plist files to be located in a bundle other than the main bundle.

Protocols/Container.html#/s:5Locus9Conta.name: validateAppSettingsKeys
Protocols/Container.html#/s:5Locus9Conta.abstract: True by default. If a user default is found in the application’s preferences that has not been registered, then a fatalError() will be thrown. Otherwise it is ignored.

Protocols/Container.html#/s:5Locus9Conta.name: load(fromLoaders:completion:)
Protocols/Container.html#/s:5Locus9Conta.abstract: Loads setting values from the passed loaders.

Protocols/Loadable.html.name: Loadable
Protocols/Loadable.html.abstract: Loadable allows objects to receive updates to default values. It’s only implemented on the LocusContainer so the container can be passed to a Loader.

Protocols/StoreFactory.html.name: StoreFactory
Protocols/StoreFactory.html.abstract: Defines a factory that is called to create a store for a setting.

Enums/AccessLevel.html#/s:5Locus11Access.name: readonly
Enums/AccessLevel.html#/s:5Locus11Access.abstract: The setting is readonly and cannot be changed.

Enums/AccessLevel.html#/s:5Locus11Access.name: transient
Enums/AccessLevel.html#/s:5Locus11Access.abstract: The setting is transient in that it can be changed, but new values are not saved to perminant storage.

Enums/AccessLevel.html#/s:5Locus11Access.name: writable
Enums/AccessLevel.html#/s:5Locus11Access.abstract: The setting can be updated. New values are stored so that when the app is restarted, the nwew value is returned.

Enums/AccessLevel.html#/s:5Locus11Access.name: releaseLocked
Enums/AccessLevel.html#/s:5Locus11Access.abstract: Special case where the value can be updated in Debug builds but is readonly in release builds. Most useful for settings that need to be changed for test environments.

Classes/Store.html#/s:5Locus5StoreC3keyS.name: key
Classes/Store.html#/s:5Locus5StoreC3keyS.abstract: Returns the key that identifies the setting.

Classes/Store.html#/s:5Locus5StoreC5valu.name: value
Classes/Store.html#/s:5Locus5StoreC5valu.abstract: Returns the current value of the setting.

Classes/Store.html#/s:5Locus5StoreC5stor.name: store(newValue:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:5Locus5StoreC5stor.abstract: Sets the current value of the setting.

Classes/Store.html#/s:5Locus5StoreC6upda.name: update(defaultValue:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:5Locus5StoreC6upda.abstract: Updates the default value of a setings.

Classes/LocusContainer.html#/s:5Locus0A9.name: registerAppPreferences
Classes/LocusContainer.html#/s:5Locus0A9.abstract: Enables or disables the auto-registering of user defaults defaultValues from settings plists.

Classes/LocusContainer.html#/s:5Locus0A9.name: validateAppSettingsKeys
Classes/LocusContainer.html#/s:5Locus0A9.abstract: If true, causes Locus to fatal if a user default is found that has not been registered.

Classes/ChainedStore.html.name: ChainedStore
Classes/ChainedStore.html.abstract: A store that can be chained with other stores to provide the a sequence of processes for storing and retrieving settings.
